mapper.select: SELECT U.EY_ACCOUNT_NUM as accountNum, U.REVEAL_ITEM as item, U.AMOUNT_CURRENT as amountCurrent, U.AMOUNT_ADJ_CR as crAmountAdj, U.AMOUNT_ADJ_DR as drAmountAdj, U.AMOUNT_AUDIT_LAST as amountAuditLast FROM wp_u U where 1 = 1 and U.STATUS = 'Y' and U.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT U300.ATTR1 as item, U300.ATTR2 as item2, U300.AMOUNT_CURRENT_CNY as amountCurrent, U300.AMOUNT_LAST_CNY as amountLast FROM wp_u300 U300 where 1 = 1 and U300.STATUS = 'Y' and U300.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U300.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT U300D.ATTR2 as item, U300D.AMOUNT_CURRENT_CNY as amountCurrent, U300D.AMOUNT_LAST_CNY as amountLast FROM wp_u300_dividend U300D where 1 = 1 and U300D.STATUS = 'Y' and U300D.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U300D.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT U300I.ATTR2 as item, U300I.AMOUNT_CURRENT_CNY as amountCurrent, U300I.AMOUNT_LAST_CNY as amountLast FROM wp_u300_interest U300I where 1 = 1 and U300I.STATUS = 'Y' and U300I.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U300I.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT C410.PERIOD as period, C410.BANK_NAME as bankName, C410.AMOUNT as amount, C410.INTEREST_RATE as interestRate, C410.DATE_FROM as dateFrom, C410.DATE_TO as dateTo FROM ds_tmpl_c410 C410 where 1 = 1 and C410.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and C410.PERIOD = #{period}
SELECT DISTINCT IFNULL(sfi.FIN_SYSTEM, 'JSZ') as FinSys FROM sys_fund_info sfi WHERE sfi.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND sfi.ACTIVE = 'Y' LIMIT 1

SELECT ts.TRANSACTION_DATE as transactionDate, ts.CURRENCY as currency, ts.EY_BUYSELL_TYPE as eyBuysellType, ts.EY_STOCKBOND_TYPE as eyStockbondType, ts.MARKET_FLAG as marketFlag, ts.STOCK_CODE as stockCode, ts.STOCK_NAME as stockName, ts.QUANTITY as quantity, ts.AMOUNT as amount, ts.SEAT_COMMISSION as seatCommission, ts.STAMPS as stamps, ts.BROKERAGE_FEE as brokerageFee, ts.TRANSFER_FEE as transferFee, ts.SEC_FEE as secFee, ts.CONTINGENCY_FEE as contingencyFee, ts.OTHER_FEE as otherFee, ts.BROKERAGE_TRANSFER_FEE as brokerageTransferFee, ts.BOND_INTEREST as bondInterest, ts.REPO_EARNINGS as repoEarnings, ts.NET_AMOUNT as netAmount, ts.TRX_TYPE as trxType, ts.MARKET as market, ts.AGENT as agent, ts.SEAT_NUM as seatNum, ts.AVERAGE_PRICE as averagePrice, ts.EY_SECURITY_CODE as eySecurityCode, ts.EY_SECURITY_NAME as eySecurityName FROM ey_trx_settlement ts where 1 = 1 and ts.ACTIVE = 'Y' and ts.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and ts.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT U400.ATTR1 as item, U400.AMOUNT_CURRENT_CNY as amountCurrent, U400.AMOUNT_LAST_CNY as amountLast FROM wp_u400 U400 where 1 = 1 and U400.STATUS = 'Y' and U400.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U400.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT U500.EY_ACCOUNT_NUM as accountNum, U500.ATTR1 as item, U500.ATTR5 as type, U500.ATTR2 as subType, U500.AMOUNT_CURRENT_CNY as amountCurrent, U500.AMOUNT_LAST_CNY as amountLast FROM wp_u500 U500 where 1 = 1 and U500.STATUS = 'Y' and U500.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U500.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT U500UTF.MARKET as market, U500UTF.TRX_AMOUNT as trxAmount, U500UTF.TRX_QUANTITY as trxQuantity, U500UTF.AMOUNT_STOCK as amountStock, U500UTF.RATE_STAMP as stampRate, U500UTF.RATE_BROKERAGE as brokerageRate, U500UTF.RATE_SEC as setRate, U500UTF.RATE_TRANSFER as transferRate, U500UTF.RATE_TRX as trxRate, U500UTF.RATE_SFC as sfcRate, U500UTF.RATE_AFRC as afrcRate, DATE_FORMAT(U500UTF.RATE_EFFECTIVE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%dT00:00:00.000') as rateEffectiveDate FROM wp_u500_trx_fee U500UTF where 1 = 1 and U500UTF.STATUS = 'Y' and U500UTF.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U500UTF.PERIOD = #{period} order by U500UTF.SORT
select sum(END_BALANCE_CNY) as endBalance FROM ey_balance eb where 1 = 1 and eb.EY_ACCOUNT_NUM = '1102' and eb.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and eb.PERIOD = #{period} and eb.ATTR5 = '北交所'
select sum(END_BALANCE_CNY) as endBalance FROM ey_balance eb where 1 = 1 and eb.EY_ACCOUNT_NUM = '1102' and eb.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and eb.PERIOD = #{period} and eb.ATTR5 = '港股通'
SELECT U500T.COMMISSION as commission, U500T.TRX_FEE_CLIENT perClient FROM wp_u500_test U500T where 1 = 1 and U500T.STATUS = 'Y' and U500T.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U500T.PERIOD = #{period} LIMIT 1

SELECT U600.ATTR1 as item, U600.AMOUNT_CURRENT_CNY as amountCurrent, U600.AMOUNT_LAST_CNY as amountLast, U600.ATTR5 as disc FROM wp_u600 U600 where 1 = 1 and U600.STATUS = 'Y' and U600.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U600.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT U600T.ATTR1 as attr1, U600T.ATTR2 as attr2, U600T.ATTR3 as attr3, U600T.ATTR4 as attr4, U600T.INDEX_FEE_PERCLIENT as indexFeePerClient FROM wp_u600_test U600T where 1 = 1 and U600T.STATUS = 'Y' and U600T.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U600T.PERIOD = #{period} LIMIT 1

SELECT sfir.COSTODY_RATE AS costodyRate, sfir.INDEX_RATE AS indexRate, sfir.MIN_INDEX_FEE AS minIndexFee, sfir.MIN_RELEASE_CHARGE AS minReleaseCharge, sfir.CHARGE_DESCRIPTION AS chargeDescription FROM sys_fund_indexfee_rate sfir WHERE 1 = 1 AND sfir.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND sfir.ACTIVE = 'Y' LIMIT 1

SELECT IF(U800.ATTR6 = '已实现' , U800.ATTR1, CONCAT(U800.ATTR1,'_',U800.ATTR6)) AS itemName, U800.ATTR6 AS realizeFlag, U800.AMOUNT_CURRENT_CNY AS amountCurrentCny, U800.AMOUNT_LAST_CNY AS amountLastCny FROM wp_u800 U800 WHERE 1 = 1 AND U800. STATUS = 'Y' AND U800.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND U800.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT U900.SORT AS sort, U900.EY_ACCOUNT_NUM AS eyAccountNum, U900.ITEM AS item, U900.AMOUNT_CURRENT AS amountCurrent, U900.AMOUNT_LAST AS amountLast FROM wp_u900 U900 WHERE 1 = 1 AND U900.STATUS = 'Y' AND U900.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND U900.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT U1000.ATTR1 as item, U1000.AMOUNT_CURRENT_CNY as amountCurrent, U1000.AMOUNT_LAST_CNY as amountLast FROM wp_u1000 U1000 where 1 = 1 and U1000.STATUS = 'Y' and U1000.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U1000.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT U1000T.ATTR1 as item, U1000T.AMOUNT_CURRENT_CNY as amountCurrent, U1000T.AMOUNT_LAST_CNY as amountLast FROM wp_u1000_test U1000T where 1 = 1 and U1000T.STATUS = 'Y' and U1000T.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U1000T.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT U10000RI.ITEM as item, IF(U10000RI.AMOUNT_CURRENT = 0, null, U10000RI.AMOUNT_CURRENT) as amountCurrent, IF(U10000RI.AMOUNT_LAST = 0, null, U10000RI.AMOUNT_LAST) as amountLast FROM wp_u10000_r_interest U10000RI where 1 = 1 and U10000RI.STATUS = 'Y' and U10000RI.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U10000RI.PERIOD = #{period} order by U10000RI.SORT

SELECT IF(SUM(U10000RI.AMOUNT_CURRENT) = 0, null, SUM(U10000RI.AMOUNT_CURRENT)) as amountCurrent, IF(SUM(U10000RI.AMOUNT_LAST) = 0, null, SUM(U10000RI.AMOUNT_LAST)) as amountLast FROM wp_u10000_r_interest U10000RI where 1 = 1 and U10000RI.STATUS = 'Y' and U10000RI.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U10000RI.PERIOD = #{period} LIMIT 1

SELECT (case when eb.attr1 = '股票投资收益' then 'STOCKS_ALL' when eb.attr1 = '债券投资收益' then 'BOND_ALL' when eb.attr1 = '资产支持证券投资收益' then 'ABS_ALL' when eb.attr1 = '贵金属投资收益' then 'GOLD_ALL' end )AS attr1, SUM(eb.DR_AMOUNT_CNY) as amount FROM ey_balance eb WHERE 1 = 1 AND eb.EY_ACCOUNT_NUM = '6111' AND eb.attr1 in ('股票投资收益','债券投资收益','资产支持证券投资收益','贵金属投资收益') AND eb.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND eb.PERIOD = #{period} AND eb.attr1 LIKE (case when #{type} = 'STOCKS_ALL' then '股票投资收益' when #{type} = 'BOND_ALL' then '债券投资收益' when #{type} = 'ABS_ALL' then '资产支持证券投资收益' when #{type} = 'GOLD_ALL' then '贵金属投资收益' end) GROUP BY attr1

SELECT U10000RI.U10000_TYPE AS type, U10000RI.ITEM as item, IF(U10000RI.AMOUNT_CURRENT = 0, null, U10000RI.AMOUNT_CURRENT) as amountCurrent, IF(U10000RI.AMOUNT_LAST = 0, null, U10000RI.AMOUNT_LAST) as amountLast from wp_u10000_r_import U10000RI where 1 = 1 AND U10000RI.status = 'Y'
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM wp_u10000_r_import u WHERE 1 = 1 AND u.fund_id = U10000RI.FUND_ID AND u.period = U10000RI.PERIOD AND u.u10000_type = U10000RI.U10000_TYPE GROUP BY u.PERIOD, u.FUND_ID, u.U10000_TYPE HAVING ( sum(u.AMOUNT_CURRENT) IS NULL AND SUM(u.AMOUNT_LAST) IS NULL ) )
AND U10000RI.U10000_TYPE LIKE CONCAT(#{type},'%') and U10000RI.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U10000RI.PERIOD = #{period} order by U10000RI.SORT

SELECT U10000RIS.TYPE AS type, U10000RIS.ITEM AS item, IF(U10000RIS.AMOUNT_CURRENT = 0, null, U10000RIS.AMOUNT_CURRENT) AS amountCurrent, IF(U10000RIS.AMOUNT_LAST = 0, null, U10000RIS.AMOUNT_LAST) AS amountLast FROM wp_u10000_r_ipt_summary U10000RIS WHERE 1 = 1 AND U10000RIS.`STATUS` = 'Y'
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM wp_u10000_r_ipt_summary u WHERE 1 = 1 AND u.FUND_ID = U10000RIS.FUND_ID AND u.PERIOD = U10000RIS.PERIOD AND u.TYPE = U10000RIS.TYPE GROUP BY u.PERIOD, u.FUND_ID, u.TYPE HAVING ( sum(IFNULL(u.AMOUNT_CURRENT, 0)) = 0 AND SUM(IFNULL(u.AMOUNT_LAST, 0)) = 0 ) )
AND U10000RIS.TYPE = #{type} AND U10000RIS.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND U10000RIS.PERIOD = #{period} ORDER BY U10000RIS.SORT

SELECT U10000RIS.TYPE AS type, '合计' AS item, IF(SUM(U10000RIS.AMOUNT_CURRENT) = 0, null, SUM(U10000RIS.AMOUNT_CURRENT)) AS amountCurrent, IF(SUM(U10000RIS.AMOUNT_LAST) = 0, null, SUM(U10000RIS.AMOUNT_LAST)) AS amountLast FROM wp_u10000_r_ipt_summary U10000RIS WHERE 1 = 1 AND U10000RIS.`STATUS` = 'Y' AND U10000RIS.TYPE = #{type} AND U10000RIS.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND U10000RIS.PERIOD = #{period} LIMIT 1

SELECT U10000RD.SORT as sort, U10000RD.ITEM as item, IF(U10000RD.AMOUNT_CURRENT = 0, null, U10000RD.AMOUNT_CURRENT) as amountCurrent, IF(U10000RD.AMOUNT_LAST = 0, null, U10000RD.AMOUNT_LAST) as amountLast FROM wp_u10000_r_dividend U10000RD where 1 = 1 and U10000RD.STATUS = 'Y' and U10000RD.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U10000RD.PERIOD = #{period} order by U10000RD.SORT

SELECT '合计' as item, IF(SUM(U10000RD.AMOUNT_CURRENT) = 0, null, SUM(U10000RD.AMOUNT_CURRENT)) as amountCurrent, IF(SUM(U10000RD.AMOUNT_LAST) = 0, null, SUM(U10000RD.AMOUNT_LAST)) as amountLast FROM wp_u10000_r_dividend U10000RD where 1 = 1 and U10000RD.STATUS = 'Y' and U10000RD.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U10000RD.PERIOD = #{period} and U10000RD.SORT like '%0' limit 1

SELECT SUM(IFNULL(U10000RD.AMOUNT_CURRENT, 0)) + SUM(IFNULL(U10000RD.AMOUNT_LAST, 0)) FROM wp_u10000_r_dividend U10000RD where 1 = 1 and U10000RD.STATUS = 'Y' and U10000RD.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U10000RD.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT U10000RO.ITEM as item, IF(U10000RO.AMOUNT_CURRENT = 0, null, U10000RO.AMOUNT_CURRENT) as amountCurrent, IF(U10000RO.AMOUNT_LAST = 0, null, U10000RO.AMOUNT_LAST) as amountLast FROM wp_u10000_r_other U10000RO where 1 = 1 and U10000RO.STATUS = 'Y' and U10000RO.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U10000RO.PERIOD = #{period} order by U10000RO.SORT

SELECT '合计' as item, IF(SUM(U10000RO.AMOUNT_CURRENT) = 0, null, SUM(U10000RO.AMOUNT_CURRENT)) as amountCurrent, IF(SUM(U10000RO.AMOUNT_LAST) = 0, null, SUM(U10000RO.AMOUNT_LAST)) as amountLast FROM wp_u10000_r_other U10000RO where 1 = 1 and U10000RO.STATUS = 'Y' and U10000RO.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U10000RO.PERIOD = #{period} limit 1

SELECT SUM(IFNULL(U10000RO.AMOUNT_CURRENT, 0)) + SUM(IFNULL(U10000RO.AMOUNT_LAST, 0)) FROM wp_u10000_r_other U10000RO where 1 = 1 and U10000RO.STATUS = 'Y' and U10000RO.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U10000RO.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT U10000CTF.ITEM as item, U10000CTF.SORT as sort, IF(U10000CTF.AMOUNT_CURRENT = 0, null, U10000CTF.AMOUNT_CURRENT) as amountCurrent, IF(U10000CTF.AMOUNT_LAST = 0, null, U10000CTF.AMOUNT_LAST) as amountLast FROM wp_u10000_c_trx_fee U10000CTF where 1 = 1 and U10000CTF.STATUS = 'Y' and U10000CTF.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U10000CTF.PERIOD = #{period} order by U10000CTF.SORT

SELECT '合计' as item, IF(SUM(U10000CTF.AMOUNT_CURRENT) = 0, null, SUM(U10000CTF.AMOUNT_CURRENT)) as amountCurrent, IF(SUM(U10000CTF.AMOUNT_LAST) = 0, null, SUM(U10000CTF.AMOUNT_LAST)) as amountLast FROM wp_u10000_c_trx_fee U10000CTF where 1 = 1 and U10000CTF.STATUS = 'Y' and U10000CTF.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U10000CTF.PERIOD = #{period} and U10000CTF.sort != 30 LIMIT 1

SELECT SUM(IFNULL(U10000CTF.AMOUNT_CURRENT, 0)) + SUM(IFNULL(U10000CTF.AMOUNT_LAST, 0)) FROM wp_u10000_c_trx_fee U10000CTF where 1 = 1 and U10000CTF.STATUS = 'Y' and U10000CTF.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U10000CTF.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT U10000CO.ITEM as item, IF(U10000CO.AMOUNT_CURRENT = 0, null, U10000CO.AMOUNT_CURRENT) as amountCurrent, IF(U10000CO.AMOUNT_LAST = 0, null, U10000CO.AMOUNT_LAST) as amountLast FROM wp_u10000_c_other U10000CO,SYS_FUND_INFO SFI where 1 = 1 and U10000CO.STATUS = 'Y' and U10000CO.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U10000CO.PERIOD = #{period} and SFI.FUND_ID = U10000CO.FUND_ID order by U10000CO.SORT

SELECT '合计' as item, IF(SUM(U10000CO.AMOUNT_CURRENT) = 0, null, SUM(U10000CO.AMOUNT_CURRENT)) as amountCurrent, IF(SUM(U10000CO.AMOUNT_LAST) = 0, null, SUM(U10000CO.AMOUNT_LAST)) as amountLast FROM wp_u10000_c_other U10000CO where 1 = 1 and U10000CO.STATUS = 'Y' and U10000CO.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U10000CO.PERIOD = #{period} limit 1

SELECT SUM(IFNULL(U10000CO.AMOUNT_CURRENT, 0)) + SUM(IFNULL(U10000CO.AMOUNT_LAST, 0)) FROM wp_u10000_c_other U10000CO where 1 = 1 and U10000CO.STATUS = 'Y' and U10000CO.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U10000CO.PERIOD = #{period}

SELECT U10000C.ITEM as item, IF(U10000C.AMOUNT_CURRENT = 0, null, U10000C.AMOUNT_CURRENT) as amountCurrent, IF(U10000C.AMOUNT_LAST = 0, null, U10000C.AMOUNT_LAST) as amountLast FROM wp_u10000_credit U10000C where 1 = 1 and U10000C.STATUS = 'Y' and U10000C.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U10000C.PERIOD = #{period} and (IF(U10000C.AMOUNT_CURRENT = 0, null, U10000C.AMOUNT_CURRENT) is not null OR IF(U10000C.AMOUNT_LAST = 0, null, U10000C.AMOUNT_LAST) is not null) order by U10000C.SORT

SELECT U10000C.WEIGHT_OPTIMISM as weight_optimism, U10000C.WEIGHT_PESSIMISM as weight_pessimism, U10000C.WEIGHT_NEUTRALITY as weight_neturality, U10000C.FORECAST_OPTIMISM as forecast_optimism, U10000C.FORECAST_PESSIMISM as forecast_pessimism, U10000C.FORECAST_NEUTRALITY as forecast_neturality FROM wp_u10000_credit_note_init U10000C where 1 = 1 and U10000C.STATUS = 'Y' and U10000C.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U10000C.PERIOD = #{period} limit 1
SELECT count(*) FROM wp_u10000_credit_note_init U10000C where 1 = 1 and U10000C.STATUS = 'Y' and U10000C.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U10000C.PERIOD = #{period} limit 1

SELECT '合计' as item, IF(SUM(U10000C.AMOUNT_CURRENT) = 0, null, SUM(U10000C.AMOUNT_CURRENT)) as amountCurrent, IF(SUM(U10000C.AMOUNT_LAST) = 0, null, SUM(U10000C.AMOUNT_LAST)) as amountLast FROM wp_u10000_credit U10000C where 1 = 1 and U10000C.STATUS = 'Y' and U10000C.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U10000C.PERIOD = #{period} limit 1

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(U10000C.AMOUNT_CURRENT, 0)) + SUM(IFNULL(U10000C.AMOUNT_LAST, 0)),0) FROM wp_u10000_credit U10000C where 1 = 1 and U10000C.STATUS = 'Y' and U10000C.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and U10000C.PERIOD = #{period}
